text: Rizvan Rashitovich Utsiyev (Russian: Ризван Рашитович Уциев; born 7 February 1988) is a Russian professional association football player of Chechen descent. He is currently the captain of Akhmat Grozny. == Career == He was called up by the Russia national football B team on 19 August 2011 for a match against the Belarusian Olympic team. == Career statistics == Club Season League League League Cup Cup Continental Continental Total Total Club Season Division Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Akhmat Grozny 2005 Premier League 1 0 0 0 – – 1 0 Akhmat Grozny 2006 FNL 7 0 0 0 – – 7 0 Akhmat Grozny 2007 FNL 2 0 0 0 – – 2 0 Kavkaztransgaz 2007 PFL 13 2 0 0 – – 13 2 Akhmat Grozny 2008 Premier League 0 0 0 0 – – 0 0 Akhmat Grozny 2009 Premier League 9 0 0 0 – – 9 0 Akhmat Grozny 2010 Premier League 25 2 0 0 – – 25 2 Akhmat Grozny 2011–12 Premier League 18 0 1 0 – – 19 0 Akhmat Grozny 2012–13 Premier League 25 1 3 2 – – 28 3 Akhmat Grozny 2013–14 Premier League 22 0 2 0 – – 24 0 Akhmat Grozny 2014–15 Premier League 24 2 1 0 – – 25 2 Akhmat Grozny 2015–16 Premier League 19 1 2 0 – – 21 1 Akhmat Grozny 2016–17 Premier League 28 0 2 0 – – 30 0 Akhmat Grozny 2017–18 Premier League 27 0 0 0 – – 27 0 Akhmat Grozny Total (2 spells) Total (2 spells) 207 6 11 2 0 0 218 8 Career total Career total Career total 220 8 11 2 0 0 231 10 == References == == Other websites == * Profile by Russian Premier League website * Player profile on FC Terek website Category:1988 births Category:Living people Category:Russian footballers
